## Tests
- [ ] backend: `cd backend && ./mvnw -B clean verify`
- [ ] frontend: `cd frontend && npm ci && npm run lint && npm test -- --watch=false`
- [ ] e2e (fast): `cd frontend && npm run e2e:fast` (si impact UI/parcours)
